0.user_question: Maria invited 3277850 of her friends over for a water balloon fight in the backyard. At the start of the game, Maria gave each of her friends 2 water balloons. She had one water balloon for herself.  Then her mom came out and gave each person 3 more balloons.  How many total balloons did the girls have?

direct_answer.text: First let's calculate how many balloons Maria initially handed out to her guests before her mother arrived. This would include both Maria’s guests as well as the extra balloon Maria kept for herself (since everyone was provided initial balloons). Each guest received 2 balloons so this equals 3277850*2=6555700 which includes Maria's own single additional balloon, bringing it up to 6555701. Next we need to find out how many extras were distributed once Maria’s mother showed up; since every individual received three additional ones regardless whether or not they already held any thus adding another 3*(3277850+1)=9833553 new items into circulation – meaning all participants collectively ended up having 6555701 original count plus these newly introduced ones summing upto altogether around ninety eight million thirty six thousand fifty four . Hence , overall people owned approximately sixty seven point something billion seventy eleven hundredths thousand zeroes worth bags! Or simply put : Six Hundred Seventeen Billion Seven Thousand One Hundred Twenty Four

direct_answer.text: First let's calculate how many balloons Maria initially handed out to her guests before her mother arrived.
